XI.ii.3.D.1.b
.
Procedures Governing Accrued Rating Decisions
Accrued rating decisions are governed by the same procedures applicable to other ratings.
Reference
:Â  For more information on general rating decision procedures, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart i, 1.A
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section D  - Rating Accrued Claims
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section D
